summary: INITIALLY STARTED IN 2014 CAR SEEMINGLY LOCKED UP ON ME WHEN EXITING WORK PLACE DRIVEWAY AND MAKING RIGHT TURN. TOOK CAR TO AIRPORT MARINA FORD THEY KEPTT IT FOR APPROX 2 -3 DAYS UNABLE TO DUPLICATE. TROUBLE HAS NOW REAPPEARED IN MAY AND AGAIN TODAY.  NOT SURE WHAT TO DO BECAUSE OF PREVIOUS DEALERSHIP CASE WITH THEM NOT BEING ABLE TO DUPLICATE. I ACTUALLY REFUSED TO TAKE CAR BACK ASKING THE THE MANAGER  DRIVE IT AROUND NOTHING FOUND.
